main.name: Victor Delgado
main.bio: 6+ years experience using Python to create software solutions to engineering problems. 4+ years experience using Javascript and React to create modern/responsive web applications
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: Primary Focus: experimental music via small group collaboration
Primary Focus: Music history and analysis
Primary Focus: Electronics and solving engineering problems through software solutions in Python

work.title: Engineering Technician
description: Developed web-based issue tracking app to communicate with teammates
Maintained active postgreSQL database of current/past test schedules (via SQLAlchemy)
Collaborated with the merch dept to create an e-commerce site (using Flask) for corporate branded swag. Currently 5k+ users

work.title: Engineering Technician
description: Automated data collection via skills learned from 'Automate the Boring Stuff' by Al Sweigert
Created data analysis/visualization reports using Python (Pandas, Matplotlib)
Maintained active database of test data (postgreSQL via SQLAlchemy)
Wrote and executed bash scripts to perform embedded systems validation tests

work.title: Engineering Sales Intern
description: Performed routine calibration of handheld and stationary landfill gas analyzers
Maintained postgreSQL database of customer and product data
Automated customer reports (data analysis/visualization) with Python (MatPlotlib, Seaborne)
Answered customer concerns via phone and email
